A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
So much has already been said about this train wreck at this point. Most people who are old enough to have seen the original trilogy in theater's will agree this movie leaves a lot to be desired. I'll take it a bit further and say this film is a betrayal to the fans who made Star Wars into the pop culture phenomenon it was prior to Disney's acquisition. 

Egregious character assassination\, nonsensical plot\, rampant far-left political messaging and a clear pro-female\, anti-male overtone. I could go on for hours\, this movie has all of this garbage and so much more.  

At the end of the day Kathleen Kennedy needs to step aside\, she's done enough damage to the franchise. 

Star Wars fans deserve better.
